complaint.description: I received an SMS stating that I have 1 free month remaining on my T&B bonus 3 GB data, after which I will be billed R171.74 per month. I was not aware of this charge as it was not clearly stated in my new phone contract. I tried to opt out by dialing *135*140#, but the number does not work. I had to go through a lot of trouble and frustration to cancel the charge, including speaking to a robot and finally a human representative. I believe many people have been caught in this situation and are unknowingly spending R171 per month.
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should clearly state any additional charges in their contracts and provide a more accessible and functional opt-out process.

meta.review_content: I received an SMS 1st Dec 'You have 1 free month remaining on your T&B bonus 3 GB data...after which you will be billed R171.74 p.m. To opt out dial *135*140#. Popped into Vodacom to be told it was in my new phone contract. Clever, I'd only skimmed the document, certainly didn't see that! Tried the *135 number, doesn't work. 'Not available, non response number.' Even cleverer! Took time and effort, screaming at a robot, finally speaking to a human to cancel. I reckon 1000s of people have been caught and are spending R171 pm unknowingly
